abstract: Ben S. Bernanke, the Federal Reserve chairman, urged banks to keep raising capital in the aftermath of losses from the credit crisis to avert deeper damage to the economy.
snippet: Ben S. Bernanke, the Federal Reserve chairman, urged banks to keep raising capital in the aftermath of losses from the credit crisis to avert deeper damage to the economy.
lead_paragraph: Ben S. Bernanke, the Federal Reserve chairman, pushed banks on Thursday to keep raising capital in the aftermath of losses from the credit crisis to avert deeper damage to the economy.

headline.main: Bernanke Says Banks Need More Capital
headline.print_headline: Bernanke Says Banks Need More Capital
